mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(HISTORY_ID) AS TOTALCOUNT, SUM(POINT) AS TOTALPOINTS FROM SUPPORT_HISTORY
SELECT SUPPORT_ID, GOAL_POINT, CURRENT_POINT, TITLE, END_DATE, IMAGE_URL, SYSDATE+9/24 - END_DATE AS DDAY FROM SUPPORT ORDER BY DDAY DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT SUPPORT_ID, GOAL_POINT, CURRENT_POINT, TITLE, END_DATE, IMAGE_URL, SYSDATE + 9/24 - END_DATE AS DDAY FROM SUPPORT WHERE STATUS = #{status} AND CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY DDAY DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUPPORT_HISTORY( HISTORY_ID, USER_ID, SUPPORT_ID, POINT, CREATED_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_SUPPORT_HISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{supportId}, #{pointsToAdd}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
INSERT INTO POINT_HISTORY( POINT_ID, USER_ID, ACTIVITY_TYPE, ACTIVITY_TITLE, POINT, CREATED_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_POINT_HISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{type}, #{title}, #{pointsToAdd}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT SUPPORT_ID, GOAL_POINT, CURRENT_POINT, TITLE, CONTENT, START_DATE, END_DATE, IMAGE_URL FROM SUPPORT WHERE SUPPORT_ID = #{supportId}
